name: Touhou Tiny Trouble
description:
Rumia has been causing trouble for the humans in Gensokyo! Travel to the forest and teach her a lesson.

Controls
  • Left arrow key (A) or right arrow key (D) - Move
  • Z (Numpad 4 / Gamepad Button West) - Shoot bullet
  • X (Numpad 6 / Gamepad Button East) - Throw Yin-Yang Orb (stronger and faster, but short range)
  • C (Numpad 8 / Gamepad Button North) - Jump. Repeat in midair to keep jumping. Hold to jump higher, tap to short-hop.
  • Escape - Pause. Click again to unpause.

This game does not use the mouse.

Credits
  • Design: Callie Calico, ChocolaMint
  • Art: Callie Calico
  • Music & SFX: Callie Calico
  • Programming: ChocolaMint
  • Free assets:
    • BrownBagLunch font: Kevin Richey
    • Controller & Key prompts: Xelu
Speedrun Hints

(Skip this section if you want to figure this out yourself)

  • Reimu moves faster while on the ground.
  • If you're quick enough, it's possible to reduce Rumia to 50% HP before she puts up her darkness shield. In the same vein, it's possible to defeat Rumia without letting her do that at all. This saves a lot of time.
